text: Scribonius Largus (c. 1-c. 50) was the Roman emperor Claudius court physician. He was the compiler of 271 prescriptions at the request of Gaius Julius Callistus, most of them was transferred to the Marcellus Empiricus work De Medicamentis Empiricis, Physicis, et Rationabilibus. ==References== Category:1 births Category:50 deaths
title: Scribonius Largus
